files.patch:
@@ -44,0 +44,10 @@
+    /**
+     * Creates an entity with a given name or numeric value.
+     *
+     * @param name the name, or numeric value
+     * @return the entity
+     */
+    public static Entity of(CharSequence name) {
+        return new Entity("&" + name + ";");
+    }
+
